Publish.LongDescription:
### Adjust School Capacity (Redux)
### Updated for 1.3.6* patch and Bridges DLC!
Change how many students your schools can handle without adding more buildings.
- **Separate sliders** for Elementary, High School, College, and University - Capacity range from **10% to 500%** of vanilla values (can lower and increase) - Convenient buttons to **Reset to Vanilla** defaults or **Quick Start** pre-set values.
### 11 languages - English, Français French, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, Italiano Italian - 日本語 Japanese, 한국어 Korean, 简体中文 Simplified Chinese, 繁體中文 Traditional Chinese - Polski Polish, Português-Brazilian Brazilian Portuguese - Wip: European Portuguese
### Notes - Safe to remove or disable any time (set sliders to 100% for vanilla values) - Remove other mods that do school capacity sizing mods - Does not use Harmony or Reflection - means safer and more resilient to game updates.
### Support and Feedback - If the mod helps you, give it a Like :) - Report issues on Github link is best. Also see Discord or the Forum link
### Credits - River-Mochi – author and maintainer - Necko1996 – code updates and testing - Thanks to Wayz for inspiration on the original School Capacity mod
